text: Yaqeenan tumharay liye ibrat ki nishani thi unn do jamaton mein jo guth gaee thin aik jamat to Allah Taalaa ki raah mein larr rahi thi aur doosra giroh kafiron ka tha woh unhen apni aankhon say apney say dugna dekhtay thay aur Allah Taalaa jisay chahaye apni madad say qavi kerta hai. Yaqeenan iss mein aankhon walon kay liye bari ibrat hai
